name: Ghost
desc: House Ghost is made up of mystics who draw power from the ancient legends. They keep their secrecy no matter how the world shifts around them, only interfering by gentling nudging the world in the right direction when deemed necessary.

name: Human
desc: House Human is made up of pragmatic martial-arts lovers who desire glory. Their beliefs will not be swayed no matter how tainted the world becomes.

name: Monster
desc: House Monster is made up of pioneers who wish to be free as the wind. For generations, its students held Sivney's spirit for exploration close to their hearts, gradually becoming a world-altering force and creating countless ingenious contraptions.

name: Fairy
desc: House Fairy is made up of scholars who are relentless in their endeavors for knowledge. The Green Leaf in the House Crest comes from the saying "One Leaf, one Bodhi" and urges the students to seek universal truths from the smallest things.

name: Demon
desc: House Demon is made up of rebels who align themselves with the darkness. The moon in the House Crest represents the guiding light in the darkness, encouraging its students to decide their own future without succumbing to the evil hiding within themselves.

name: Angel
desc: House Angel is made up of virtuous students born under the Holy Light and is the most righteous House. Its students watch upon the world's sufferings with compassion and pity.
